24.content: Analyze Volunteer Management System benefits for ISSB Portal
24.details: Review the detailed technical specification and identify key enhancements over current volunteer system. Focus on benefits for single $360/year membership model.

25.content: Design database schema for volunteer opportunities system
25.details: Create Supabase tables for: volunteer_opportunities, volunteer_assignments, volunteer_logs. Integrate with existing volunteer_hours table.

26.details: Create edge functions for: CRUD operations on opportunities, member sign-up system, assignment management, enhanced hour logging.

27.details: Create: Admin opportunity management page, Member opportunity browse/sign-up page, Assignment tracking dashboard, Enhanced volunteer progress tracking.

28.details: Connect volunteer opportunities system with the 30-hour membership requirement. Track progress toward membership activation through opportunities.
